alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield, southwestern Lancaster and west central Kershaw Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winnsboro, moving northeast at 40 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Fairfield County Airport, Longtown, Liberty Hill, Lake Wateree State Park, Ridgeway, Lebanon Fire Station, Mitford, Fairfield County Detention Center, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, White Oak and Blackstock. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 33 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
